about_the_game:
Latecomers' Victorian Chest

Making their fashionably late arrival to the Victorian collection, these five antique outfits capture the haunting charm of a time long past. Start your adventure in classic style with the Latecomers' Victorian Chest!

Includes
  • Walter's Victorian Skin Set
  • Warly's Victorian Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Victorian Skin Set
  • Wortox's Victorian Skin Set
  • Wurt's Victorian Skin Set
detailed_description:
Latecomers' Victorian Chest

Making their fashionably late arrival to the Victorian collection, these five antique outfits capture the haunting charm of a time long past. Start your adventure in classic style with the Latecomers' Victorian Chest!

  • Wormwood's Victorian Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This Victorian Chest contains the second addition to the Victorian series. Contains skins for: Walter, Warly, Wormwood, Wortox, and Wurt.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
